metadata.title: CVE-2019-20093 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The PoDoFo::PdfVariant::DelayedLoad function in PdfVariant.h in PoDoFo0.9.6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointerdereference) via a crafted file, because of ImageExtractor.cpp.

criterions.comment: libpodofo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
